subject: Bait-e-Rizwan | Sahaba
description: Allah ka razi howa Momineen se jinhoney Bait ki... na k sb sahaba se 'بے شک الله مسلمانوں سے راضی ہوا جب وہ آپ سے درخت کے نیچے بیعت کر رہے تھے پھر اس نے جان لیا جو کچھ ان کے دلو ں میں تھا پس اس نے ان پر اطمینان نازل کر دیا اور انہیں جلد ہی فتح دے دی'

subject: Azmaish | Imtehaan | Kalma parhna kafi nhi
description: Sirf kalma parhna kafi nhi azmaish hogi zaroor, ayat says: Do people think that they will be left alone because they say: We believe, and will not be tested.  'کیا لوگ خیال کرتے ہیں یہ کہنے سےکہ ہم ایمان لائے ہیں چھوڑ دیئے جائیں گے اور ان کی آزمائش نہیں کی جائے گی'

subject: Azmaish | Imtehaan | Kalma parhna kafi nhi
description: Imtehaan hoga, kalma parhna kafi nhi, ayat says: Do you think that you will enter Paradise before Allah tests those of you who fought (in His Cause) and (also) tests those who are As-Sabirun (the patient)?   -   'کیا تم یہ خیال کرتے ہو کہ جنت میں داخل ہو جاؤ گے اور ابھی تک الله نے نہیں ظاہرکیا ان لوگوں کو جو تم میں سے جہاد کرنے والے ہیں اور ابھی صبر کرنے والوں کو بھی ظاہر نہیں کیا'

subject: Muslim Musalmaan | Pehla Muslim Pehla Musalmaan
description: this ayat is in honor of Prophet Mohammad (s.a.w.a.w) - ayat says:  'وَأَنَا أَوَّلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ'  He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims.

subject: Allah ka jism | Paoon foot
description: Narrated Anas: The Prophet (s.a.w.a.w) said, The people will be thrown into the (Hell) Fire and it will say: Are there any more (to come)? (50.30) till Allah puts His Foot over it and it will say, Qati! Qati! (Enough Enough!). weblink: https://sunnah.com/bukhari:4848

subject: Nabi (s.a.w.a.w) ko parhna | read karna aata tha
description: Allah ne farmaya k aap (s.a.w.a.w) in logo ko - Parh -  kr sunae Noah ka kissa... Quran kahe parho aur musalmaan kahe parhna nhi aata tha. word 'اَتْلُ' root word 'تلو'

subject: Sahaba Odool, Adil | Hazrat Omar ko ahadees nahi pata
description: Abu Mosa Ashari ko bulaya Hazrat Umar ne, teen dafa salam kr k ijazat li nhi mili tu wapis ho liye q k hadees mai yahi hukum hai. Umar ne baad main kaha k is amal pr hadees laoo warna saza doonga .....  Agar sahabi adil hain tu Umar ne kyuo kaha k gawah lao warna saza doonga, usey tu kehna tha k tum adil ho gawah nhi chahye .....     Sahih Bukhari main bhi hai, abhi reference nhi ..... - .....  Quran Surah Nur #24, verse 27-28, yahi hukum hai quran ka, k salam karo aur ijazat na mile tu wapis lotoo... Hazrat Umar ko tu Quran ki ayaat ka bhi nhi pata

subject: Bina Ijazat Jana | Permission
description: Hukum hai quran ka, k salam karo aur ijazat na mile tu wapis lotoo... Hazrat Umar ko tu Quran ki ayaat ka bhi nhi pata -- is pr tehqeeq karoo milega kisi k ghar main gaye thy Umar phalang kr

description: taboot e Sakina: is taboot main Ale Moosa aur Ale Haroon ki chezain hai jo sukoon hain emaan waloo k lye

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Wahi: Hazrat Haroon pr Wahi nazil ki

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Hidayat: Hazrat Haroon ko hidayat di aur aise hi naik kaam karne waloo ko badla dete hain

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Emaan Laye Jadoghar: Hazrat Moosa aur Haroon k rab pr emaan laye Jadoogar Fir'oon k

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Khalifa: Hazrat Moosa ne kaha Hazrat Haroon se k tm Khalifa ho. Note: kaha tha na k banaya khalifa

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Qom Haroon ko Qatal kar deti: Hazrat Moosa gussa howey tu Hazrat Haroon ne kaha k qoam ne unhe kamzoor samja aur qareeb tha k qatal karti phir Hazrat Mosa ne dua ki k Allah bakhsh de unhey aur un k bhai haroon ko. ----- Note: Sunni aqeedey main tu Nabi afzal hai Hazrat Ali se, tu ab kia Hazrat Haroon ko kahoge k wo dar gaye thy naozubillah jo logoo ki is'lah nhi ki aur shirk krne dia? Hazrat ali k time pr tu shirk nhi howa tha.    ---- point 2:  jb gunah kia nhi tu Hazrat Musa khud k lye aur apne bhai jo k Nabi thy un k lye astagfaar q?

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Allah ne sath bheja: Hazrat Moosa k sath Haroon ko bheja Firoon k pass

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Haroon rehmat se atta howa: Allah ne Hazrat Mosa ko rehmat se un ka bhai Hazrat Haroon atta kia

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Wazeer: Dua, Haroon ko Wazeer(Minister) bana de

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Brother: My brother Haroon

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Increase Strength: Dua, Increase through him (haroon) my strength

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Partner in my Job: Dua, mere kaam main usey Shareek kr de

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Hum tuje yaad kare: Dua, hum teri tasbeeh kare bht zyada aur tuje yaad kare bht zyada aur tu janta hai. Allah ne kaha k jo manga wo dia

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Haroon k naam ka Kalma: jadogaro ne kaha, Haroon aur Musa k RAB pr emaan laye

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Book: Allah says, Hum ne Moosa aur Haroon ko farq karne wali aur roshni di

description: Book: Allah says, Hum ne bheja Moosa aur us k bhai Haroon ko apni Nishaniyoo aur khule dala'il k sath

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Wazeer, brother: Humne Moosa ko kitaab di aur us k bhai Haroon ko Wazeer/minister banaya

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Wahi: Hazrat Musa ne Allah se kaha, Haroon ki taraf bhi Msg bheej

subject: Hazrat Haroon In Quran
description: Ah'saan: Humne Moosa aur Haroon pr Ehsaan kia ----- Nijaat: Musa, Haroon aur unki Qom ko Gham se Nijaat di ----- Madad ki: Allah ne in donoo Musa aur Haroon ki madad ki tu galib rahe ----- Kitaab: Allah ne donoo ko kitaab di ----- Hidayat: Allah ne donoo ko Seedhey Rastey ki Hidayat ki ----- Zikr Baqi rakha: Allah ne donoo ko Zikr Khair baad waloo main baqi rakha ----- Allah ka SALAM: Allah ne Musa aur Haroon pr Salam nazil kia ----- Momin: Allah ne Musa aur Haroon donoo ko Momin kaha

subject: Sahaba | Sahib | Majnoon
